glosses: ablative singular second-person single-possession of taraf
ablative singular third-person single-possession of taraf

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish طرفندن (tarafından). By surface analysis, taraf + -ı + -n- + -dan.
Cognate with Azerbaijani tərəfindən, Bashkir тарафынан (tarafınan), Crimean Tatar tarafından, Tatar тарафыннан (tarafınnan), Turkmen tarapyndan, Uyghur تەرەپىدىن (terepidin).
